short_description: Ergonomic Vertical Mouse Design: Vertical shape keeps your wrist in a neutral, upright position to help reduce strain and discomfort compared to a standard mouse, supporting long hours of comfortable productivity.

Quiet Click Buttons & Stable 2.4 GHz Wireless: Silent left and right mouse buttons reduce noise and help maintain focus. Note: scroll wheel and back/forward buttons are not silent. Plug-and-play wireless connection with up to 30 ft (≈10 m) range.

Natural Learning Curve: Due to the ergonomic shape, first-time users may need a short adjustment period. Most users adapt within 1–2 weeks and experience improved comfort and reduced wrist pressure with continued use.

Soft Rubber-Coated Build: Soft-touch rubber surface provides a secure, comfortable grip for extended use. Dimensions: 4.92 × 2.44 × 3.03 inches; Weight: 0.35 lb. Features a smooth-scroll wheel without tactile steps or adjustable resistance.

Adjustable DPI & Easy Navigation: Adjustable DPI settings (1000 / 1600) provide precise optical tracking. Includes back and forward buttons for convenient web browsing. Buttons are not programmable; back/forward buttons are not supported on macOS.

Wide Compatibility & Warranty: Compatible with Windows 7, 8, 10, and 11, macOS 10.12 or later, and Android 4.3 or later. Package includes 1 mouse, 1 charging pad, and 1 user manual. Backed by a 12-month limited warranty via the Perixx website.
